item.title: Redirecting a webpage using html
item.description: The redirect function in IIS 7 and 7.5 is in my experience pretty buggy. More often than not it will send the visitor into an eternal redirect loop. Because of that I have used this simple html code for redirecting, instead of using the built in function in IIS. Use it at your own will, Iâ€™m just posting it so I know where to find it the next time I need it ðŸ™‚
